name: Revolut <> Coupa
description: When there is a trigger on a specified schedule, do action

extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every

extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.name: start_after

extended_output_schema.hint: Automatically created by Coupa in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+HH:MMZ
extended_output_schema.label: Created at
extended_output_schema.name: created_at

extended_output_schema.hint: All segments concatenated with a hyphen ( - )
extended_output_schema.label: Code
extended_output_schema.name: code

extended_output_schema.hint: Select the required account. Account ID can be found at the end of URL.
extended_output_schema.label: Account ID
extended_output_schema.name: id

extended_output_schema.hint: Each segment represents the segment of the account code. E.g. code: 99-9023-100132 where segment-1 is 99, segment-2 is 9023, and segment-3 is 100132.
extended_output_schema.label: Segment 1
extended_output_schema.name: segment_1

extended_output_schema.hint: Each segment represents the segment of the account code. E.g. code: 99-9023-100132 where segment-1 is 99, segment-2 is 9023, and segment-3 is 100132.
